html:
Creative Directions

Creative Directions; guides students towards a career in the creative industries by developing a career plan based on industry research. Key activities include professional networking, industry engagement, and portfolio development. The module culminates in a portfolio/report that encapsulates the student's career strategy and industry-specific research

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Utilise practical and theoretical research to identify potential career paths within a specialist industry sector. [Enquiry]

+  Present industry research and a personal career strategy to an audience using professional communication methods, ensuring clarity in written, oral, and visual techniques.[Communication]

+  Implement a personal career strategy and portfolio plan to enhance your presence and professional standing within a specialist industry sector. [Application]

+  Reflect and evaluate personal outcomes and progress based on professional review and feedback. [Reflection]

Module Content:
